snippet: Formula One is coming to a new track outside Austin, Tex., the Circuit of the Americas, in November, as the organization once again tries to raise its profile in the United States.
abstract: Formula One is coming to a new track outside Austin, Tex, the Circuit of the Americas, in November 2012, as the organization once again tries to raise its profile in the United States.
lead_paragraph: Formula One is coming to a new track outside Austin, Tex., the Circuit of the Americas, in November, as the organization once again tries to raise its profile in the United States.

headline.seo: Formula One, a Tough Sell in the U.S., Plants a Flag in Austin
headline.main: Formula One Track, Nearing First Race, Gets Wary Embrace From Austin
headline.print_headline: Formula One Track, Nearing First Race, Gets Wary Embrace From Austin
